alert.note: Alert for Conway; Faulkner; Southeast Van Buren County (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 9:50PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Van Buren, northeastern Conway and Faulkner Counties through 1015 PM CDT... At 950 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Whipple, or 13 miles south of Clinton, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Conway... Greenbrier... Vilonia... Wooster... Guy... Damascus... Enola... Twin Groves... Mallet Town... Whipple... Pickles Gap... Springhill... Catholic Point... Woolly Hollow State Park... Springfield... Holland... Bee Branch... Barney... Austin in Conway County... Hamlet... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for central and north central Arkansas.

area.areaDesc: Conway; Faulkner; Southeast Van Buren County
